publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5437 Cathie Craigie: Eastfield Primary School’s SEET Success—That the Parliament congratulates Eastfield Primary School in Cumbernauld on winning the North Lanarkshire heat of the Scottish European Educational Trust’s (SEET) Euroquiz; commends SEET for promoting and educating students in Scotland’s schools, colleges and universities about Europe and the European Union; hopes that SEET will continue its good work across Scotland, and wishes Eastfield Primary School every success for the national final in May 2010.

S3M-5437 Cathie Craigie: Eastfield Primary School’s SEET Success—That the Parliament congratulates Eastfield Primary School in Cumbernauld on winning the North Lanarkshire heat of the Scottish European Educational Trust’s (SEET) Euroquiz; commends SEET for promoting and educating students in Scotland’s schools, colleges and universities about Europe and the European Union; hopes that SEET will continue its good work across Scotland, and wishes Eastfield Primary School every success for the national final in May 2010. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Bill Kidd*, James Kelly*, Bill Butler*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Whitefield*, Aileen Campbell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-5437 Eastfield Primary School’s SEET Success (lodged on 17 December 2009) Helen Eadie*, Mary Mulligan*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-5437 Eastfield Primary School’s SEET Success (lodged on 17 December 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
